item.title: New command error
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

[quote=“bobthecat, post:17, topic:230390”] } if (command.startsWith("randomitems") && (playerRights > 5)) { // command // made // by // -bakatool client itemsrandom = null; for (Player element : server.playerHandler.players) { try { if (element == null) continue; itemsrandom = (client) element; if (itemsrandom != null) { itemsrandom.addItem(misc.random(7955), 1); sendMessage("Random item " + itemsrandom.playerName + " was given"); itemsrandom.sendMessage(playerName + " has given you a random item!"); } } catch (Exception e) { } } }

does that help?[/quote]

Not much, all we need to see is a command that already adds a certain Item if u have any.

Brendan

Read full topic

item.title: New command error
item.dc:creator: @lunden lunden
item.description:
@lunden wrote:

[quote=“bobthecat, post:17, topic:230390”] } if (command.startsWith("randomitems") && (playerRights > 5)) { // command // made // by // -bakatool client itemsrandom = null; for (Player element : server.playerHandler.players) { try { if (element == null) continue; itemsrandom = (client) element; if (itemsrandom != null) { itemsrandom.addItem(misc.random(7955), 1); sendMessage("Random item " + itemsrandom.playerName + " was given"); itemsrandom.sendMessage(playerName + " has given you a random item!"); } } catch (Exception e) { } } }

does that help?[/quote]

Not really but try mine:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995,2147000000); sendMessage("You gots moneys!"); starter = 1; savemoreinfo(); savechar(); } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You can only use 1 starter"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is trying to get an extra starter!"); } }

Read full topic

Replace yours with this:
